title: One Piece
description: One Piece follows the adventures of Monkey D. Luffy, a spirited young pirate with the ability to stretch his body like rubber after eating a mystical fruit called the Gum-Gum Fruit. Luffy dreams of becoming the King of the Pirates by finding the legendary treasure known as the One Piece, hidden at the end of the Grand Line. To achieve his goal, he gathers a diverse crew known as the Straw Hat Pirates, each with their own dreams and unique abilities. Together, they face powerful foes, uncover ancient mysteries, and navigate a world filled with fantastical islands and dangerous seas, all while exploring themes of friendship, freedom, and adventure.

title: Sousou no Frieren
description: "Frieren: Beyond Journey's End" follows Frieren, an elven mage who was part of a legendary hero's party that defeated the Demon King. After the hero's death, she embarks on a journey to understand human emotions and the fleeting nature of life. As she travels through a world transformed by their adventures, Frieren meets new companions, confronts her past, and learns to cherish the memories and connections forged along the way. The series beautifully explores themes of friendship, loss, and the passage of time, all while blending fantasy and introspective storytelling.

title: Attack on Titan Season 1
description: In Season 1 of "Attack on Titan," humanity is on the brink of extinction, living within massive walled cities to protect themselves from the Titans—giant humanoid creatures that devour humans. The story follows Eren Yeager, his adoptive sister Mikasa Ackerman, and their friend Armin Arlert, who join the military after a devastating Titan attack breaches their city walls, resulting in the destruction of their home and the death of Eren's mother. As they train and fight against the Titans, Eren discovers he possesses a mysterious ability to transform into one himself, leading to questions about the Titans' origins and humanity's fight for survival. The season explores themes of fear, sacrifice, and the struggle against overwhelming odds.

title: Attack on Titan Season 2
description: In Season 2 of "Attack on Titan," the story delves deeper into the mysteries surrounding the Titans and the world beyond the walls. Following the shocking revelations of Eren's Titan abilities, the Survey Corps faces new threats as Titans appear within their territory, leading to suspicion and fear among the ranks. As they confront the enigmatic Armored Titan and Female Titan, the season unveils the identities and motives of key characters, including Reiner Braun and Annie Leonhart. Meanwhile, the truth about the Titans begins to surface, challenging everything humanity believes about their existence and prompting intense battles that test the bonds of friendship and loyalty. The season culminates in dramatic confrontations that set the stage for even greater conflicts ahead.

title: Attack on Titan Season 3
description: In Season 3 Part 1 of "Attack on Titan," the narrative shifts to the political turmoil within humanity’s walls, focusing on the power struggles of the government and the Survey Corps. Eren Yeager and his friends grapple with their roles in a world rife with corruption and betrayal, as they uncover a conspiracy that threatens their very survival. With the emergence of the mysterious Historia Reiss, the true lineage of the royal family comes to light, forcing Eren and his allies to confront difficult choices about loyalty and leadership. As tensions escalate, the group must navigate internal conflicts while preparing for the looming Titan threat, leading to intense confrontations that reveal both personal and societal stakes in the battle for freedom.

title: Boku no Hero Academia
description: In Season 1 of "My Hero Academia," we follow the journey of Izuku Midoriya, a Quirkless boy in a world where most people possess superpowers known as Quirks. Dreaming of becoming a hero like his idol All Might, Midoriya faces the harsh reality of his lack of abilities until he unexpectedly inherits All Might's legendary power. Enrolling in U.A. High School, a prestigious academy for aspiring heroes, he begins to train alongside a diverse group of classmates, each with unique abilities. As they face rigorous challenges, including intense training exercises and villainous threats, Midoriya learns the value of hard work, friendship, and resilience, setting the stage for his growth as a hero in a world fraught with danger and ambition.
japaneseTitle: 僕のヒーローアカデミア

title: Boku no Kokoro no Yabai Yatsu
description:
Fascinated by murder and all things macabre, Kyoutarou daydreams of acting out his twisted fantasies on his unsuspecting classmates — but an encounter with Anna Yamada, the gorgeous class idol, lights a spark in the darkness of his heart. It’s a classic tale of an antisocial boy falling for a popular girl, but neither are who they appear to be at first glance. Will Kyoutarou and Anna defy their expectations of each other — and of themselves?

(Source: HIDIVE)
japaneseTitleRomaji: Boku no Kokoro no Yabai Yatsu

title: Kimi no Na wa.
description: In a breathtaking tale of fate and connection, two high school students, Taki and Mitsuha, find their lives intertwined in a mysterious way. Taki, a boy living in bustling Tokyo, begins to experience vivid dreams in which he swaps bodies with Mitsuha, a girl from a rural town. As they navigate each other's lives—facing challenges, friendships, and personal struggles—they develop a deep bond despite never having met in person. However, when a catastrophic event threatens Mitsuha's town, the pair must work together across time and space to uncover the truth and save each other, ultimately exploring themes of love, memory, and the invisible threads that connect us all.

title: Vivy: Fluorite Eye's Song
description:
When highly evolved AIs set out to eradicate mankind, the carnage that ensues fills the air with the stench of fresh blood and burning bodies. In a desperate bid to prevent the calamity from ever occurring, a scientist bets everything on a remnant from the past.

Turning the clock back a hundred years, AIs are already an integral part of human society, programmed with specific missions meant to be carried out for their entire course of operation. Vivy, the first ever autonomous AI, is a songstress tasked with spreading happiness through her voice. In a theme park where she hardly ever gets a proper audience, she strives to pour her heart out into her performances, bound to repeat it day after day—that is, until an advanced AI from the future appears before her and enlists her help in stopping a devastating war a hundred years in the making. With no time to process the revelation that flips her world upside down, Vivy is catapulted into a century-long journey to avert the violent history yet to come.

[Written by MAL Rewrite] (from MAL)
japaneseTitle: Vivy -Fluorite Eye's Song- (ヴィヴィ -フローライトアイズソング-)

title: One Punch Man
description: The seemingly ordinary and unimpressive Saitama has a rather unique hobby: being a hero. In order to pursue his childhood dream, he trained relentlessly for three years—and lost all of his hair in the process. Now, Saitama is incredibly powerful, so much so that no enemy is able to defeat him in battle. In fact, all it takes to defeat evildoers with just one punch has led to an unexpected problem—he is no longer able to enjoy the thrill of battling and has become quite bored.

title: Death Note
description: High school student and prodigy Light Yagami stumbles upon the Death Note and—since he deplores the state of the world—tests the deadly notebook by writing a criminal's name in it. When the criminal dies immediately following his experiment with the Death Note, Light is greatly surprised and quickly recognizes how devastating the power that has fallen into his hands could be.

title: Dandadan
description: This is a story about Momo, a high school girl who comes from a family of spirit mediums, and her classmate Okarun, an occult fanatic. After Momo rescues Okarun from being bullied, they begin talking. However, an argument ensues between them since Momo believes in ghosts but denies aliens exist, and Okarun believes in aliens but denies ghosts exist.
